item.title: 一名妇女呼吁医生办公室为待产病人和流产病人设立单独的候诊区。
item.description:
A woman is calling for doctors’ offices to have separate waiting areas for expecting patients and patients who are experiencing pregnancy loss. https://t.co/XCnx4RMdRv

item.title: 凯文-弗兰科（Kevin Franke）的妻子因虐待儿童被捕，在警方最新公布的采访录像中，他首次讲述了自己的故事。
item.description:
In newly released police interview footage of Kevin Franke, from after his wife was arrested for child abuse, he tells his story for the first time. https://t.co/YghuV03Adg pic.twitter.com/WlZMxU6yls

— ABC News (@ABC) March 24, 2024

item.title: 日本航天局及其主要承包商表示，他们希望在 Space X 公司主导的竞争日益激烈的市场中，能够利用上个月首飞成功的新型 H3 火箭打造一个有利可图的发射业务。
item.description:
Japan’s space agency and its prime contractor say they hope to be able to forge a profitable launch business with their new H3 rocket after its first successful flight last month in an increasingly competitive market dominated by Space X. https://t.co/WSu3ygxB3p

— ABC News (@ABC) March 24, 2024

item.title: 观看纽约帝国大厦周六晚关闭外部照明一小时，以纪念 "地球一小时 "这一全球应对气候变化的活动。
item.description:
Watch as New York City's Empire State Building shuttered its exterior lights for an hour Saturday night to observer Earth Hour, the global campaign against climate change. https://t.co/GNjXeLLZkb pic.twitter.com/Mj3ayudeLw

— ABC News (@ABC) March 24, 2024

item.title: 根据最新的联邦死亡率最终数据，在经历了两年的下降之后，美国人的预期寿命在 2022 年有所增长。
item.description:
After two years of decline, life expectancy in the U.S. increased in 2022, according to new final federal mortality data. https://t.co/OQ6atVvWWT

— ABC News (@ABC) March 24, 2024

item.title: 威斯康星州的一家博物馆正与一个历史保护组织合作，在南太平洋寻找二战王牌飞行员理查德-邦的飞机残骸。
item.description:
A Wisconsin museum is partnering with a historical preservation group in a search for the wreckage of World War II ace Richard Bong's plane in the South Pacific. https://t.co/yLWFp416Zf pic.twitter.com/OmorUpuBfN

item.title: 雅典阿提卡动物公园 10 年来首次诞生了一只珍稀濒危的侏儒河马。

item.title: 美国副总统卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）在接受美国广播公司新闻节目 @rachelvscott 的最新采访时，驳斥了俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）关于乌克兰卷入周五莫斯科致命袭击事件的说法。

item.title: 联邦安全机构警告说，使用滚珠让孩子们吃甜液体的糖果与窒息有关，其中至少有一人死亡，因此不应该使用这种糖果。
item.description:
Candy treats that use roller balls to let kids eat sweet liquid have been linked to choking, including at least one death, and should not be used, a federal safety agency warned. https://t.co/L7UQrT7vKX

item.title: 新一批有影响力的人正在网上爆红--但他们实际上都不存在。认识一下人工智能创造的社交媒体明星。
item.description:
A new breed of influencers are blowing up online — but none of them actually exist. Meet the social media stars created by AI. https://t.co/rEwTDtFOYE

item.title: 明天，@本周美国广播公司：副总统卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）在接受 @rachelvscott 采访时驳斥了俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）关于乌克兰与周五莫斯科致命袭击有关的说法。敬请收看@ThisWeekABC。

item.title: 据一个追踪执法人员自杀事件的非营利组织发布的报告称，在七年时间里，全国有 1200 多名公共安全人员死于自杀。
item.description:
More than 1,200 of the nation's public safety personnel died by suicide over a seven-year period, according to a report released by a nonprofit organization that tracks law enforcement suicides. https://t.co/KYpqAYyeoC

— ABC News (@ABC) March 23, 2024

item.title: 美国的统计数据显示，暴力犯罪已大幅下降。然而，对一些人来说，对犯罪的看法与数据相左。

item.title: 一项新的分析显示，目前在美国买房要比租房贵得多，预计至少在未来五年内，房地产市场都将如此。
item.description:
Buying a house in the U.S. is considerably more expensive than renting right now, and the real estate market is expected to stay that way for at least the next five years, according to a new analysis. https://t.co/i2lCAbzCN6

item.title: 1939 年，奥帕尔-李（Opal Lee）年仅 12 岁，当时一群种族主义白人暴徒冲进她位于得克萨斯州沃思堡的家并放火焚烧，85 年后，她正在收回他们的土地。
item.description:
Opal Lee was only 12 years old in 1939 when a racist white mob stormed and set fire to her home in Fort Worth, Texas, and 85 years later, she is reclaiming their land. https://t.co/rdBs4AdTta

— ABC News (@ABC) March 23, 2024

item.title: 本日：1998 年，《泰坦尼克号》获得 11 项奥斯卡奖，包括最佳影片、最佳导演（詹姆斯-卡梅隆）和最佳歌曲（"My Heart Will Go On"），刷新了奥斯卡纪录。
item.description:
ON THIS DAY: In 1998, “Titanic” tied an Academy Awards record by winning 11 Oscars, including best picture, director (James Cameron) and song (“My Heart Will Go On”). https://t.co/Yzbs1JD4Kv pic.twitter.com/PUaC4cS0qB

— ABC News (@ABC) March 23, 2024

item.title: 一场跨国暴风雪给美国东部大部分地区带来大雪和洪水，东海岸 5000 多万人处于洪水警报之下。

item.title: 一位中国牧师发现，即使从监狱释放出来，他也没有完全获得自由，他买不到火车票，甚至不能去医院看医生。
item.description:
Unable to buy a train ticket, or even see a doctor at a hospital, a Chinese pastor found that his even after release from prison, he is not quite free. https://t.co/excFoVL8rs

— ABC News (@ABC) March 23, 2024
